name: Saturdays (Wrong Way Games)
description:
Submission for the "Lost Cartridge Jam 2021." This game is able to be played on a real Gameboy (which is why the rom file is provided), as well as in your browser. Enjoy, and good luck to all participants!

I would like to place a special thanks here for GBStudio's copy/paste scripts feature. Literally naming my child after the creator after this jam.
